name: eluzelz2d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cz))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cz))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cz))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))

comment: A member of an upper set of integers is an integer. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
